bug_description: In the Shorts video screen, after opening the Comments panel and then closing it, the bottom Tab bar (Home/Shorts/Profile) becomes hidden/covered and does not return to its normal visible position.
action: Open a Shorts video → tap the Comments icon to open the Comments panel → close the Comments panel (swipe down or tap close) → observe the bottom Tab bar area.
expected_state: After closing the Comments panel, the bottom Tab bar should be fully visible and clickable, and the Shorts player layout should return to its normal state without any UI elements being obscured.
